lsr.boogeyman.choose.the_boogeyman.title: Da boogiman
lsr.boogeyman.choose.the_boogeyman.descr: U are da boogiman. U must by ani means necessawy kill a %1$s or %2$s (ew) nam by direct action to b curd of da curs. If u fail, next session u will bcome a %3$s nam. All (das a lot) loyalties and fwiendships are gone while u are da boogiman!!
If u don get automatically curd when u perform a homocide, plz notify an operator uwu.
lsr.boogeyman.choose.not_the_boogeyman.d: u are NOT da boogiman. Da boogiman needs, by ani means, murder a %1$s or %2$s nam by direct action to b curd of da boogicurse. All loyalties and fwiendships are wemoved whil they are da boogiman!! Beware of every1  !!!1!
lsr.boogeyman.punish.description.p1: U failed to murder a %1$s or %2$s name last session as da boogiman(stupit). As punishment u hav droppd to ur %3$s. All alliances are separated (very sad) and u are now hostil to all players. U may tem up with da other peopl on their last life (omg title) if u wish!!
